alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Walton, southwestern Holmes and central Washington Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 211 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near De Funiak Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, Whitehead Crossroads, Eucheeanna, Five Points, Hulaw, Knox Hill, Poplar Head, Argyle, Sylvania and Johnson Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
